comment_6: I mean no one can say for sure, but it is pretty obvious he wrote this about Rihanna and their very public relationship problems. I think people assume because Chris Brown did that to her he's this horrible person, but this song shows that he really deeply cared about her and wanted to try to make things right, he's just a flawed person who messed up big time. The song is basically saying I know our relationship is hanging by a thread and I didn't treat you the way I should...but if you give me another chance we can start over with a clean slate. It's a beautiful song, no one can deny that, regardless of what you think about Chris Brown personally.

comment_10: I think this song is about a relationship that has gone sour. The guy obviously made a mistake in their relationship and he's recognized his error a little too late, but at least he has recognized it and now, he wants to make things right again for her-for them, and he wants the girl to give him another chance and he also understands that it's going to take some time to rebuild what they had before it all went amiss, so they are going to have to start from the bottom up, hence the "So we'll crawl till we can walk again, then we'll run until we're strong enough to jump, then we'll fly until there is no end, so let's crawl....crawl...(crawl) back to love" so, I guess he hopes that in the end love can conquer all and they can still have what they once had, and everything that they hoped to have.
